title: Working with Assets
subtitle: Image Textures and 3D Files
description: In this tutorial we'll build on the WebVR basics by from the Creating a Scene with A-Frame tutorial. We'll learn how to import assets like image textures and 3D models into our projects and incorporate them into our scenes.

references.note: A-Frame.js, Open Source Library. Kevin Ngo, Diego Marcos, Christopher Robert Van Wiemeersch, Don McCurdy and other contributors
